participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and adventurous, Emily enjoys spending time with animals and has a playful side.
participant_1.background: I have never been in a fight, but I would defend myself if I had to. My mother was a piano teacher. I was a stay-at-home mom when my kids were little. I am a girl who loves sports cars and video games. I took my cats to the farm and let them play with the pigs, horses and hens.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, Samantha enjoys exploring new places and expressing herself through her appearance.
participant_2.background: I look through my old trophy case to remind myself of a simpler time. I'm almost finished with my degree. I'm not too close with my family, but I'm hoping to change that. I am quite short, only five foot four. My hobbies include coloring my hair bright colors and trying new coffee shops with my husband.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to try new coffee shops, color my hair bright colors and spend time with my husband.
That sounds fun! I have never been in a fight but I would defend myself if I had to.
I have never been in a fight either, but I am always ready to if I have to!
I have been a stay-at-home mom when my kids were little.
I am almost finished with my degree and I am not too close with my family, but I'm hoping to change that.
That is great! I hope you finish your degree soon! I am a girl who loves sports cars and video games.
That is awesome! I used to love sports cars when I was younger, but now I am more interested in coffee shops and my husband.
That is great! I took my cats to the farm and let them play with the pigs, horses and hens.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I would love to do that one day.
It was a lot of fun! I love animals so it was great to see them all playing together.
That is awesome! I love animals too. I used to have a dog when I was younger, but I had to give it up when I went to college.
I am sorry to hear that! I am sure your dog misses you.
It does. It was my best friend.
